properties.name: slotbot.auth.token.name
properties.description: Name of the authentication token used to validate requests.

properties.name: slotbot.auth.token
properties.description: The token that should be used to validate requests.

properties.name: discord.token
properties.description: The token of the discord bot. Found under https://discord.com/developers/applications.

properties.name: discord.id
properties.description: The id of the discord bot.

properties.name: discord.guild
properties.description: The id of the discord guild the bot runs in.

properties.name: battlemetrics.apiAccessToken
properties.description: A Personal Access Tokens of the battlemetrics api. Can be acquired under https://www.battlemetrics.com/developers. Permissions needed: rcon:read.

properties.name: battlemetrics.serverIds
properties.description: Server ids to check status for.
